data.comment: The match has started.
Reims are coming forward and Boulaye Dia gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Reims.
Reims are pushing forward but Moreto Cassama's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
In the minute 6, Reims are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Bordeaux.
Bordeaux's Remi Oudin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Reims at Matmut Atlantique.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Boulaye Dia for Reims drives towards goal at Matmut Atlantique. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 12, Reims are caught offside.
Throw-in Reims.
Moreto Cassama (Reims) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Reims.
Reims's Yunis Abdelhamid scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Arber Zeneli instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 18, Goal! Boulaye Dia extends Reims's lead to 0-2.
Reims have a goal kick.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 26, Jerome Brisard awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 33, Free kick Reims.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Jerome Brisard waits before resuming play because Paul Baysse for Bordeaux is still down.
In the minute 40, Paul Baysse for Bordeaux is back on the field again.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 41, Bordeaux's Loris Benito has been booked in Bordeaux.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
In Bordeaux, Arber Zeneli of Reims is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 44, Jerome Brisard awards the home team a throw-in.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Reims.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Matmut Atlantique.
In Bordeaux Bordeaux drive forward through Hwang Ui-Jo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Jean-Louis Gasset (Bordeaux) is making a first substitution, with Maxime Poundje replacing Loris Benito.
In the minute 46, Jean-Louis Gasset is making the team's second substitution at Matmut Atlantique with Josh Maja replacing Mehdi Zerkane.
Corner awarded to Reims.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Reims in the half of Bordeaux.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 50, Jerome Brisard signals a Reims throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bordeaux close to the penalty box.
Hwang Ui-Jo of Bordeaux smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 54, Hatem Ben Arfa of Bordeaux gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jerome Brisard awards Reims a goal kick.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
In the minute 57, Reims drive upfield and Valon Berisha gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bordeaux defender.
Bordeaux's Hatem Ben Arfa misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bordeaux.
In the minute 60, In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Reims have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Toma Basic (Bordeaux) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 68, Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
In the minute 70, Bordeaux are in shooting range from this free kick.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
In the minute 73, Hwang Ui-Jo puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Hatem Ben Arfa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Valon Berisha (Reims) has received a yellow card from Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 78, Yacine Adli for Bordeaux has been booked by Jerome Brisard and receives a first yellow card.
Can Bordeaux capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Reims's half?
Bordeaux have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 79, Reims will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bordeaux.
Reims needs to be cautious. Bordeaux have an attacking throw-in.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Jerome Brisard awards the home team a throw-in.
El Bilal Toure is on a sub for Arber Zeneli for Reims.
Moussa Doumbia is replacing Nathanael Mbuku for Reims at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 83, The away team have replaced Valon Berisha with Marshall Munetsi. This is the third substitution made today by David Guion.
Jean-Louis Gasset is making the team's third substitution at Matmut Atlantique with Amadou Traore replacing Hwang Ui-Jo.
Jean-Louis Gasset (Bordeaux) is making a fourth substitution, with Dilane Bakwa replacing Remi Oudin.
In the minute 85, Free kick Reims.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Reims at Matmut Atlantique.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Bordeaux.
Reims take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Marshall Munetsi.
In the minute 89, Boulaye Dia with an assist there.
At Matmut Atlantique the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Bordeaux Bordeaux attack through Hatem Ben Arfa. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Reims at Matmut Atlantique.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Reims.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Bordeaux. The final score is 1-3.
Tom Lacoux is replacing Yacine Adli for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
